alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 4:53AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Recent rainfall in the basin has caused additional rises on the Green River, and at Paradise and Calhoun. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 25.6 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
